description: This file defines the Integration entity class for the backend domain. It maps to the 'integrations' table in the database and includes fields for id, key, name, and description with corresponding getters and setters.

classes.name: Integration
classes.description: Entity class representing an integration with fields for id, key, name, and description, mapped to the database.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the integration.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description: Returns the key identifier for the integration.

methods.name: setKey
methods.description: Sets the key identifier for the integration.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the integration.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the integration.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the integration.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the integration.
